name: As Saboor
description: As Saboor (الْصَّبُور) is one of the names of Allah in Islam, meaning 'The Patient' or 'The Most Patient'. It reflects Allah's attribute of enduring and being patient with His creation, forgiving their shortcomings and sins.
summary: The name As Saboor signifies Allah's enduring patience and ability to withhold anger and punishment, emphasizing His compassion and mercy towards humanity. The concept encourages believers to embody patience in their own lives, understanding the importance of forbearance in facing life's challenges.
